VerificationResult Class

A class that contains information about a verification result.

⊟ Member Details

⊟ FileName Property

The filename of the original plaintext message.

public string FileName { get; }

⊟ Value

A string containing the filename of the original plaintext message file if it is known, null otherwise.

⊟ Remarks

⊟ Requirements

Namespace: Libgpgme
Assembly: gpgme-sharp (in gpgme-sharp.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

⊟ Signature Property

Information about all signatures for which a verification was attempted.

public Signature Signature { get; }

⊟ Value

A Signature object. null if the message was not signed.

⊟ Remarks

A linked list with information about all signatures for which a verification was attempted. You can use the Signature.Next property or the Signature.GetEnumerator() method to enumerate all signatures.

⊟ Requirements

Namespace: Libgpgme
Assembly: gpgme-sharp (in gpgme-sharp.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0
